title: Polity & Governance
summary:
### Topics Covered:
- Constitution of India: Preamble, Fundamental Rights, DPSP, Fundamental Duties.
- Union and State Government structure.
- Separation of powers, dispute redressal.
- Local governance (Panchayati Raj, municipalities).
- Public policy & rights issues.

title: History of India & Indian National Movement
summary:
### Topics Covered:
- Ancient India: Indus Valley Civilization, Vedic period, Mauryan & Gupta empires.
- Medieval India: Delhi Sultanate, Mughal Empire, regional kingdoms.
- Modern India: Advent of Europeans, freedom struggle, important leaders & movements.

title: Geography – Physical, Social & Economic
summary:
### Topics Covered:
- Physical geography of India & world.
- Climate, vegetation, soils.
- Distribution of resources.
- Geographical features & their changes.
- Economic geography (agriculture, industry, transport).

title: Economic & Social Development
summary:
### Topics Covered:
- Sustainable development.
- Poverty, inclusion, and demographics.
- Social sector initiatives.
- Government budgeting & planning.
- Indian economy overview.

title: Environment & Ecology
summary:
### Topics Covered:
- General issues on environmental ecology.
- Climate change & biodiversity.
- Environmental conservation laws & policies.
- Protected areas & species in India.

title: Science & Technology
summary:
### Topics Covered:
- General science basics.
- Developments in biotechnology, IT, space.
- Indian scientific achievements.
- Awareness in fields of nanotech, robotics, AI.

title: Current Events of National & International Importance
summary:
### Topics Covered:
- Current affairs relevant to polity, economy, environment, S&T.
- Major government policies & initiatives.
- International relations updates.

title: CSAT – Comprehension & Reasoning
summary:
### Topics Covered:
- Reading comprehension.
- Logical reasoning & analytical ability.
- Decision-making & problem-solving.
- Basic numeracy & data interpretation.
